bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Abbreviated Designation of wang jin ye 亡津液 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Shi ji 十劑：脫者，氣脫也，血 脫也，精脫也，神脫也。脫則散而不收，故用酸澀溫平之藥，以斂其 耗散。汗出亡陽，精滑不禁，泄痢不止，大便不固，小便自遺，久嗽亡 津，皆氣脫也 , “A ‘release’ may be a release of qi, a release of blood, a release of seminal fluid, and a release of spirit. In the case of a release, [the qi, blood, etc.] disperses and is not collected again. Hence one resorts to sour, astringent, warming and neutral medications to gather what is dispersed. When sweat leaves [the body], this is a loss of yang. In case of spontaneous emission of seminal fluid, incessant outflow and free-flux illness, instability of defecation, spontaneous urination, and a long-lasting cough, with a loss of body liquids , all these are losses of qi”.
